original_solution_mapping.L1: Jerry has to walk to the sink/recycling bin 28 cans / 4 cans per trip = <<28/4=7>>7 trips
original_solution_mapping.L2: The round trip takes 10 seconds per way * 2 ways = <<10*2=20>>20 seconds
original_solution_mapping.L3: Counting the time he spent pouring out the cans and the time the round trip took, he spent 20 seconds per trip + 30 seconds per trip = <<20+30=50>>50 seconds per trip
original_solution_mapping.L4: With 7 round trips, he spent 50 seconds per trip * 7 trips = <<50*7=350>>350 seconds

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1554.
    Returns: the total time it takes Jerry to throw all cans away.
    """
    # L1
    total_cans = 28 # 28 cans on Jerry's desk
    cans_per_trip = 4 # carry four cans at once
    number_of_trips = total_cans / cans_per_trip

    # L2
    time_per_way = 10 # ten seconds each way
    ways_in_round_trip = 2 # WK
    round_trip_time = time_per_way * ways_in_round_trip

    # L3
    drain_time_per_trip = 30 # 30 seconds to drain those 4 cans
    total_time_per_trip = round_trip_time + drain_time_per_trip

    # L4
    total_time_spent = total_time_per_trip * number_of_trips

    # FA
    answer = total_time_spent
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Jerry has to walk to the sink/recycling bin {total_cans} cans / {cans_per_trip} cans per trip = <<{total_cans}/{cans_per_trip}={number_of_trips}>>{number_of_trips} trips
The round trip takes {time_per_way} seconds per way * {ways_in_round_trip} ways = <<{time_per_way}*{ways_in_round_trip}={round_trip_time}>>{round_trip_time} seconds

Counting the time he spent pouring out the cans and the time the round trip took, he spent {round_trip_time} seconds per trip + {drain_time_per_trip} seconds per trip = <<{round_trip_time}+{drain_time_per_trip}={total_time_per_trip}>>{total_time_per_trip} seconds per trip

With {number_of_trips} round trips, he spent {total_time_per_trip} seconds per trip * {number_of_trips} trips = <<{total_time_per_trip}*{number_of_trips}={total_time_spent}>>{total_time_spent} seconds

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Jerry has to walk to the sink/recycling bin 28 cans / 4 cans per trip = <<28/4=7>>7 trips
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The round trip takes 10 seconds per way * 2 ways = <<10*2=20>>20 seconds
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Counting the time he spent pouring out the cans and the time the round trip took, he spent 28 seconds per trip + 30 seconds per trip = <<28+30=58>>58 seconds per trip
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: With 7 round trips, he spent 58 seconds per trip * 7 trips = <<58*7=406>>406 seconds

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_cans' (value: 28) was used instead of 'round_trip_time' (value: 20).
